title: Ways of detilting
body: In the past few days I got Rito'd regularily and I wasnt loading in half of my games, so naturally as this can be frickin' tilting and non good for ones LP, I wanted to ask you what you do to avoid getting tilted to the point where you burn down your house.

replies.body: Thank you man this really does the trick

There are many things I do, when I get tilted to a point I don't want to be tilted. Usually I just turn on some instrumental music (guitar e.g.) or, as dumb as it sounds, kinda "depressiv" music or sth. not quite sure how to descirbe it (e.g https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K1uevDKA14Y). Which really stop me from getting tilted, whem I'm already in-game. 
But when you wan't to stop getting tilted, because you don't get in-game. I'd just start a custom game every day on, until it works. (If the problem also appears there) You can also download the Hextech Repair Tool (https://support.riotgames.com/hc/de/articles/224826367-Automatisierte-Fehlerbehebung-Hextech-Repair-Tool), which might help you solving the problem (if you haven't already opened a ticket to the Riot Support yet (https://support.riotgames.com/hc/de/requests/new))
As long as you've got that problem I recommend watching YouTube, Twitch or Netflix, Amazon Prime etc. (Free test month should help you there)

There are also a lot more games you can play besides League of Legends. But starting a new game when you want to play another game probably isn't the best idea.
